title: Am I Doing This Right?
description:
Brad Lawrence, Elena, and David Crabb share stories about 8th grade bullies and nerds, sexual exploration between kids, and a strange way of seeing Sleep No More.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Julian Lage, DNCE, Brad Lawrence, Jenny Lewis, David Crabb, Jeff Barr, Kevin Allison, Elena)
